name: Family Spearfishing
description:
Spearfishing with your family in Playa del Carmen Mexico will lead to family memories of a lifetime. Your family will be talking about this trip for many years! You will be taught how to get your first fish on a spear! You snorkel on the surface, hold your breath, dive under the water and shoot the fish you want to eat. Away from the touristy areas, spearfishing will be a great adventure that you and your family will love! Family members can snorkel or just tag along as well.

Your spearfishing guide in Playa del Carmen is Diego, an inspiring biologist, who speaks Spanish and English. He is freediving certified by FII and will instruct you and your beloved well in the basics of freediving and spearfishing. Group rates are available upon request. We accept cancellations up to 48 hours before your scheduled trip for a full refund. Spearfishing Today is the original spearfishing charter in Playa del Carmen and Spearfishing Today will take care of your family. Book in advance, this is a limited availability trip.
